sneckomod:SnekBite.NAME: Snek Bite
sneckomod:SnekBite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL sneckomod:Muddle the highest-cost card in your hand.
sneckomod:SnekBite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL sneckomod:Muddle the !M! highest-cost cards in your hand.

sneckomod:TailWhip.NAME: Tail Whip
sneckomod:TailWhip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 0 - !M! Weak. NL Apply 0 - !M! Vulnerable.

sneckomod:SoulRoll.NAME: Soul Roll
sneckomod:SoulRoll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL sneckomod:Muddle your hand. NL Draw 1 card.

sneckomod:PerplexingStare.NAME: Perplexing Stare
sneckomod:PerplexingStare.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies gain between -3 and !M! Strength.

sneckomod:SnekBeam.NAME: Snek Beam
sneckomod:SnekBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to the number of Unknown cards in your deck. NL Exhaust.
sneckomod:SnekBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to the number of Unknown cards in your deck.

sneckomod:Nope.NAME: Nope
sneckomod:Nope.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Exhaust a card in your hand. NL Replace it with a random card of the same type that costs 1 less. NL Exhaust.
sneckomod:Nope.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Exhaust a card in your hand. NL Replace it with a random card of the same type that costs 1 less.

sneckomod:SoulCleanse.NAME: Soul Cleanse
sneckomod:SoulCleanse.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL sneckomod:Muddle your hand. Cards sneckomod:Muddled this way cannot cost 3. NL Exhaust.
sneckomod:SoulCleanse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL sneckomod:Muddle your hand. Cards sneckomod:Muddled this way cannot cost 3.

sneckomod:SoulExchange.NAME: Soul Exchange
sneckomod:SoulExchange.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Draw 1 card, then Exhaust 1 card. NL Exhaust your hand, replacing them with random cards of the Exhausted card's class.
sneckomod:SoulExchange.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Draw 2 cards, then Exhaust 1 card. NL Exhaust your hand, replacing them with random cards of the Exhausted card's class.

sneckomod:CheapStock.NAME: Cheap Stock
sneckomod:CheapStock.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, reduce the cost of the highest cost sneckomod:Offclass card in your hand by 1.
sneckomod:CheapStock.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, reduce the cost of the highest cost sneckomod:Offclass card in your hand by 1.

sneckomod:UnlimitedRolls.NAME: Unlimited Rolls
sneckomod:UnlimitedRolls.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Soul *Roll to your hand. It gains Ethereal and Exhaust.
sneckomod:UnlimitedRolls.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add a *Soul *Roll to your hand. It gains Ethereal and Exhaust.

sneckomod:MasterEye.NAME: Master Eye
sneckomod:MasterEye.DESCRIPTION: Become Confused. NL Draw !M! additional card each turn.
sneckomod:MasterEye.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Become Confused. NL Draw !M! additional cards each turn.

sneckomod:ImprovisedAttack.NAME: Improvised Attack
sneckomod:ImprovisedAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a random sneckomod:Offclass Attack into your hand and sneckomod:Muddle it.

sneckomod:ImprovisedGuard.NAME: Improvised Guard
sneckomod:ImprovisedGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a random sneckomod:Offclass Skill into your hand and sneckomod:Muddle it.

sneckomod:QuickMove.NAME: Quick Move
sneckomod:QuickMove.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL sneckomod:Muddle the highest-cost card in your hand.
sneckomod:QuickMove.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL sneckomod:Muddle the !M! highest-cost cards in your hand.

sneckomod:QuickBite.NAME: Snake Rake
sneckomod:QuickBite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! - 2 cards. NL sneckomod:Muddle the highest-cost card in your hand.

sneckomod:Rotation.NAME: Rotation
sneckomod:Rotation.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Discard all sneckomod:Offclass cards. NL Draw that many cards plus !M!.

sneckomod:SerpentMind.NAME: Exotic Form
sneckomod:SerpentMind.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a sneckomod:Offclass card, draw 1 card.

sneckomod:SlitherStrike.NAME: Slither Strike
sneckomod:SlitherStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce the cost of sneckomod:Offclass cards in your hand by 1 this turn.

sneckomod:PureSnecko.NAME: Shift
sneckomod:PureSnecko.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Exhaust all sneckomod:Offclass cards in your hand, replacing them with new ones.
sneckomod:PureSnecko.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Exhaust all sneckomod:Offclass cards in your hand, replacing them with new ones that cost 1 less.

sneckomod:Cheat.NAME: Cheat
sneckomod:Cheat.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL This turn, cards that choose a random number for their effect choose the maximum possible number. NL Exhaust.
sneckomod:Cheat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL This turn, cards that choose a random number for their effect choose the maximum possible number.

sneckomod:Restock.NAME: Restock
sneckomod:Restock.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Discard your hand. NL Draw 5-10 cards. NL Exhaust.

sneckomod:GlitteringGambit.NAME: Glittering Gambit
sneckomod:GlitteringGambit.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Set your *Gold to !M! % - 120 % of its current amount. NL Exhaust.

sneckomod:Transmogrify.NAME: Transmogrify
sneckomod:Transmogrify.DESCRIPTION: Lose a random Relic. NL Choose to gain it back, or obtain a random Relic at the same rarity at the end of combat. NL Exhaust.

sneckomod:DefensiveFlair.NAME: Defensive Flair
sneckomod:DefensiveFlair.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, increased by !M! for each sneckomod:Offclass card in your hand.

sneckomod:DangerNoodle.NAME: Danger Noodle
sneckomod:DangerNoodle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat this for each sneckomod:Offclass card in your hand, then Exhaust those cards.

sneckomod:SerpentIdol.NAME: Serpent Idol
sneckomod:SerpentIdol.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Choose 1 of 3 random sneckomod:Offclass cards to add into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

sneckomod:TrashToTreasure.NAME: Trash to Treasure
sneckomod:TrashToTreasure.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Exhaust a card. NL Gain [E] equal to its cost. NL Exhaust.
sneckomod:TrashToTreasure.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Exhaust a card. NL Gain [E] equal to its cost.

sneckomod:DiceBlock.NAME: Dice Block
sneckomod:DiceBlock.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! - !B! Block. NL Maximum Block is increased by 1 for each sneckomod:Unknown card you started combat with.

sneckomod:MixItUp.NAME: Mix It Up!
sneckomod:MixItUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each of your Potions. NL Lose your Potions and replace them with new ones. NL Exhaust.

sneckomod:MorePower.NAME: More Power!
sneckomod:MorePower.DESCRIPTION: Obtain an additional Upgraded sneckomod:Unknown card reward at the end of combat.

sneckomod:RainOfDice.NAME: Rain of Dice
sneckomod:RainOfDice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !qqq! - !D! damage to a random enemy 2 - !M! times. NL sneckomod:Muddle the next 2 - !M! cards you draw.

sneckomod:DiceCrush.NAME: Dice Crush
sneckomod:DiceCrush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! - !D! damage. NL Maximum damage is increased by 1 for each sneckomod:Unknown card you started combat with.

sneckomod:SnakeSap.NAME: Snake Sap
sneckomod:SnakeSap.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Deal !qqq! - !D! damage. NL Gain 1 - !M! [E] . NL Exhaust.

sneckomod:DiceBoulder.NAME: Dice Boulder
sneckomod:DiceBoulder.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! - !D! damage. NL Can be Upgraded any number of times.

sneckomod:Mudshield.NAME: Mud Shield
sneckomod:Mudshield.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you sneckomod:Muddle a card, gain 1 Block next turn.
sneckomod:Mudshield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you sneckomod:Muddle a card, gain 1 Block next turn.

sneckomod:WideSting.NAME: Wide Sting
sneckomod:WideSting.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! - !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Upgrade all sneckomod:Offclass cards in your hand.

sneckomod:Bewildered.NAME: Bewildered
sneckomod:Bewildered.DESCRIPTION: When you play another card, sneckomod:Muddle your hand, then discard this. NL Exhaust.
